Public Overrides Function EditValue (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, provider As IServiceProvider, value As Object) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EditValue(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, IServiceProvider ^ provider, System::Object ^ value);

Docs.param: A type descriptor context that can be used to provide additional context information.
A service provider object through which editing services may be obtained.
An instance of the value being edited.
Docs.summary: Edits the specified object value using the editor style provided by GetEditorStyle. A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object hasn't changed, this should return the same object it was passed.

Docs.param: A type descriptor context that can be used to provide additional context information.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the editing style of the method. If the method is not supported, this will return None.
Docs.returns: An value indicating the provided editing style.
